channel.title: China on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in China on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Samsung's New Phones Show How Far Ahead China Is on Innovation
item.description: Just like it has done with EVs, China’s investment in smartphones is leaving big brands playing catch-up. Forget iterative updates: China is already working on what’s next.

item.title: Rocket Report: SpaceX to make its own propellant; China’s largest launch pad
item.description: United Launch Alliance begins stacking its third Vulcan rocket for the second time.
